sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>item_option_new</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Variable Width</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var variableTypes = { '12' : 'Break', '14' : 'Macro', '15' : 'UI Page', '17' : 'Macro with Label', '19' : 'Container Start', '20' : 'Container End', '21' : 'List Collector', '23' : 'HTML', '24' : 'Container Split', '28' : 'IP', };
var type = current.type; var width = current.variable_width; var msgArray = [variableTypes[type], width];
if (type == '14' || type == '15' || type == '17' || type == '21' || type == '23') { if (width == '25') invalidWidthBlocker(); } else if (type == '28' && (width == '75' || width == '100' )) invalidWidthBlocker();
else if (type == '12' || type == '19' || type == '20' || type == '24') { if (width != '') invalidWidthBlocker(); }
function invalidWidthBlocker() { var msg = gs.getMessage("{1}% width option not supported for {0} variable", msgArray); gs.addErrorMessage(msg); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-30 12:24:49</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>188164bd672122008f87794717415aff</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Variable Width</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">3607b4283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fee</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_188164bd672122008f87794717415aff</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-10-26 08:06:26</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=188164bd672122008f87794717415aff"/> </record_update>
